content.description:
Directions: Answers must be in essay form. Outline form is not acceptable. Labeled diagrams may be used to supplement discussion, but in no case will a diagram alone suffice. It is important that you read each question completely before you begin. 

As part of a new suburban development, a sports complex consisting of athletic fields and buildings is constructed in a formerly wooded area.
content.question: Predict ONE ecological consequence on the local plant community that is likely to result during the site preparation and construction of the sports complex. Justify your prediction.

frqParts.text: Predict ONE ecological consequence on the local plant community that is likely to result during the site preparation and construction of the sports complex. Justify your prediction.

skill.text: 6.C: Provide reasoning to justify a claim by connecting evidence to biological theories.
